## Client.findByID() method

findByID queries the store for the id of an instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findByID<T = any>(threadID: ThreadID, collectionName: string, ID: string): Promise<Instance<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  threadID | ThreadID | the ID of the database |
|  collectionName | string | The human-readable name of the model to use. |
|  ID | string | The id of the instance to search for. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Instance&lt;T&gt;&gt;
